Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: books, journals and magazines, CDs, spoken word cassettes, videos, DVDs, jigsaws, language tapes, A3 and A4 photocopier. Community language material in Albanian, Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, Farsi, Pashto, Persian, Somali, Turkish and Urdu. The library is available to hire for meetings. Activities include coffee morning, and Councillor's surgeries. Provides 5 People's Network computers for adults and 3 computers for children with Microsoft Office and internet access, and a scanner, all for public use. Exhibition space available (booking required).

Langs.entry: Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, Pashto, Somali,Turkish, Urdu

DisabledAccess.entry: Wheelchair access to adult library only

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-7pm, Tues, Wed & Fri 10am-5.30pm, Thurs closed, Sat 9.30am-4pm (opening times); Mon 3.30-6pm (Homework Zone), Tues 1.30-3pm (under 5s Story Time, term-time only), Wed 10am-12noon (coffee morning), 2nd Fri in the month (Baby Time), 1st & 3rd Sat in the month 10.30-11.30am (Councillor's Surgeries)
